scripts.build-js: yarn run build-framework && yarn run build-app
scripts.build-amd64: yarn run build-framework && yarn run build-app && vgo generate -tags js && set CGO_ENABLED=1&& set GOARCH=amd64&& vgo build -v -ldflags="-H windowsgui" -tags js
scripts.build-386: yarn run build-framework && yarn run build-app && vgo generate -tags js && set GOARCH=386&& set CGO_ENABLED=1&& vgo build -ldflags="-H windowsgui" -v -tags js
